DOC.brief_summary: Soccer account 10 % sport injury youth require medical attention . The injury rate youth soccer establish injury prevention program estimate 22-30 injuries/100 participants/year , 3.4-5.6 injuries/1000 participation hour . Risk reduction range 32-43 % find youth player participate neuromuscular training program , FIFA 11+ , include agility , balance training , strengthen component . Although study show FIFA 11+ effective reduce injury , poor uptake program youth soccer community . It therefore important develop way deliver program soccer coach player order maximize protective benefit . The Health Action Process Approach ( HAPA ) behavior change theory use successfully predict uptake health behaviour number population , cancer screening exercise , test sport injury prevention setting . The primary objective study examine effect HAPA-based coach education intervention adherence FIFA 11+ group female youth soccer player course one outdoor one indoor season . The secondary objective examine dose-response relationship program adherence injury , compare program adherence injury rate outdoor indoor soccer . Our hypothesis team whose coach receive HAPA-based intervention great adherence program team whose coach receive intervention , injury incidence decrease adherence program increase . It expect program adherence low injury rate higher indoor soccer compare outdoor soccer .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Behavioural Intervention Injury Prevention Program Adherence Female Youth Soccer
DOC.detailed_description: The first wave 16 team recruit spring 2013 , follow 2013 outdoor season , follow 2013-2014 indoor season . The second wave 16 team recruit fall 2013 , follow 2013-2014 indoor season , follow 2014 outdoor season .
